eu.ehri.project.commands

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCommand, Check, CmdEntryPoint, CountryAdd, CsvConceptImport, CsvDocDescImport, DcImport, DeleteEntities, EacImport, EadAsVirtualCollectionImport, EadImport, EagImport, EntityAdd, EntityDelete, GenSchema, GetEntity, GraphSON, GraphViz, IcaAtomEadImport, ImportCommand, ImportCsvCommand, Initialize, ListEntities, LoadFixtures, PersonalitiesImport, RelationAdd, SkosVocabularyImport, UserAdd, UserListEntities, UserMod, UshmmEadImport

    public interface Command
    Command-line tools to perform actions on the graph database need to specify a help text about the functionality of the tool and a string to explain their usage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int exec(com.tinkerpop.frames.FramedGraph<?> graph, String[] args)
      Execute this command with the given arguments.

      Execute this command with the given command line options.
      String getDetailedHelp()
      Get the formatted help blurb, including options.
      String getHelp()
      Get information about the functionality of the command.
      String getUsage()
      Get a short hint about the usage of the command.
